bill_title: revise the information that is collected and appears on a driver license.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the information that is collected and appears on a driver license. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 32-12-3 be amended to read as follows: 32-12-3. Every application under this chapter shall state the full legal name or any other name taken for lawful purposes, date of birth, social security number, sex, race, and current mailing address and residential address of the applicant, and briefly describe the applicant. The applicant shall state whether he the applicant has previously been licensed as an operator, and, if so, when and by what state or country, and whether an application has ever been refused, and, if so, the date of and reason for such suspension, revocation, or refusal. All applicants Each applicant shall certify the information provided as true and correct. Section 2. That § 32-12-17.10 be amended to read as follows: 32-12-17.10. An operator's license, motorcycle operator's license, restricted minor's permit, motorcycle restricted minor's permit, instruction permit, and motorcycle instruction permit shall bear a distinguishing number assigned to the licensee, the full legal name or any name lawfully taken, date of birth, residence address, an indication if the licensee is a donor pursuant to chapter 34-26, an indication if the licensee as a living will pursuant to chapter 34-12D or a durable power of attorney for heath care pursuant to chapter 59-7, a color photo and a brief description of the licensee , including race , and the licensee's signature. The department shall indicate upon each license the general class of vehicles that the licensee may drive. If a barcode, or other means by which information may be retrieved electronically, is placed on the license, the data field may contain the information printed on the license and the licensee's encrypted social security number.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
